sentences.en: Do not use soap as it may irritate sensitive skin.
sentences.cn: 不要使用香皂,因其对敏感皮肤产生刺激.

sentences.en: Don't irritate her, she's on a short fuse today.
sentences.cn: 别惹她, 她今天动不动就发火.

sentences.en: EYES: Dust may cause moderate eye irritation . Fumes may irritate eyes.
sentences.cn: 眼睛: 粉末将导致中等程度眼睛过敏.

sentences.en: He suppresses his sorrow; empathy and compassion only irritate him.
sentences.cn: 他抑制自己的悲伤, 同情只会激怒他.

sentences.en: Her effusive manner of greeting her friends finally began to irritate them.
sentences.cn: 她向朋友们打招呼时那种过于热情的方式到头来使他们感到不是滋味.

sentences.en: Her uncritical acceptance of everything I said began to irritate me.
sentences.cn: 我说什么她都不论对错一概接受，这倒惹我不耐烦起来。

sentences.en: I do not want to irritate anything or anybody.
sentences.cn: 我不想给任何事情任何人带来影响.

sentences.en: I sat staring at the clock for some time, and its ticking began to irritate me.
sentences.cn: 我坐着望了一会钟, 滴答滴答的钟声叫我心烦意乱,便走出屋子.

sentences.en: In these conditions, the lashes irritate the eye, causing the tears.
sentences.cn: 在这种情况下, 睫毛刺激眼睛产生眼泪.

sentences.en: It really irritates me when he doesn’t help around the house.
sentences.cn: 家里的事情他一点都不帮忙，真让我恼火。

sentences.en: Skincare products of inferior quality may irritate sensitive skin.
sentences.cn: 劣质护肤品会刺激敏感的肌肤.

sentences.en: These tight shoes irritate my toes.
sentences.cn: 我的鞋太紧,夹痛我的脚趾.

sentences.en: To tick someone off is to annoy or irritate someone.
sentences.cn: 没错!那家伙说话这么大声害我不能专心看书.

sentences.en: Today, her chirping enthusiasms did not irritate Lily.
sentences.cn: 今天她在丽莉耳旁叽叽喳喳说的那些热情话并没惹丽莉发火.

sentences.en: Wear rubber gloves while chopping chillies as they can irritate the skin.
sentences.cn: 切辣椒时要戴橡胶手套，因为辣椒会刺激皮肤。

sentences.en: Your interruptions only serve to irritate the entire staff.
sentences.cn: 你的打扰只能让全体职员都很不快.

words.tran_cn: 刺激的；气人的；使愤怒的
刺激的；刺激性的；使发怒的
[医] 刺激物，[医] 刺激剂
激怒；使…无效；使…兴奋（irritate的过去分词）

trans.tran_en: to make someone feel annoyed or impatient, especially by doing something many times or for a long period of time
If something irritates you, it keeps annoying you

trans.tran_cn: 刺激，使兴奋，使发怒，使感到不适，使疼痛，使发炎
trans.tran_en: to make someone feel annoyed or impatient, especially by doing something many times or for a long period of time
